column5: Hello All,  I'm heading up to Diamond lake this weekend and was wondering what kind of fish are in it. Any hot spots would be appreciated.  Thanks,  Stretch8z
Uhh which Diamond Lake? There are a few I think.

Lakers and we usually caught them on live minnow rigs on set lines. I lived on the west shore of the lake for a few years and I always fished that side, I never fished anywhere but off my property so I don't know how the bite was anywhere else on the lake.
OK Diamond Lake in Bancroft has Lakers and bass. I've only fished it in the winter....caught lakers in the area furthest away from South Baptiste Lk. Rd. Good luck.....
